column5: Beautiful quite setting, sleeps 2-4 people, all amenities. No pool. Smoking outside only. Private bathrooms, hammock, fire circle, and BBQ Pit. Come enjoy the Kerrville Folk Festival, we are only a 5 minute drive from Quiet Valley Ranch, and less than 45 min from Frederrickburg, Tx home of many wineries and wine tours. Have a fenced yard and pets are welcome.
column8: Quiet Hill Country Room, Near Folk Festival
